title: About
text:
Hi, I’m Anna, a master’s student in Cognitive Neuroscience at Maastricht University. In the past, I have completed bachelor’s in Data Science & AI and Psychology. My interests lie in the fields of mental health, neuroscience and women’s brain health.
During my academic journey, I have developed a passion for applying machine learning techniques to the mental health and neuroscience domains. Currently I am following this interest during an internship at the University of California, Santa Barbara (UCSB), where I investigate the impact of the sex hormones estradiol and progesterone on brain connectivity during the menstrual cycle. Bonus: The amazing view from the lab, which you can see on the top of this page!
In my free time, I enjoy bouldering, hiking, water colouring, lino cuts.

title: Welcome
text:
Hi! My name is Anna and I am currently a master’s student in Cognitive Neuroscience at Maastricht University.
My research interests lie in the application of machine learning methods to the mental health and neuroscience domains.
Contact: anna-lena.krause@student.maastrichtuniversity.nl
